articles.title: NASA's Psyche spacecraft preps for Oct 5 launch - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: NASA's Psyche mission aims to explore the metal-rich asteroid Psyche, offering insights into planet formation.
articles.content: The spacecraft will embark on a unique spiral path to reach the asteroid, marked by key milestones and test periods for NASA's Deep Space Optical Communications (DSOC) technology. Once the spacecraft… [+1410 chars]
